name: .DRA File Extension
summary: Learn about .DRA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Audio file saved by Dragon, a program used to generate text documents from voice recordings; stores the audio as it was dictated by the user; saved so that the software's generated text can be corrected later if it does not match the dictation.

content: Dragon uses speech recognition technology to translate spoken audio data into text documents.
NOTE: Nuance has discontinued Dragon NaturallySpeaking.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
